resources.maxItemsHelpText: The maximum amount of recent viewed items to be shown
resources.itemsPerRowLargeDesktopHelpText: How many items will be displayed, per row, on large desktop resolution
resources.itemsPerRowDesktopHelpText: How many items will be shown per row in a regular desktop resolution
resources.itemsPerRowTabletHelpText: How many items will be displayed per row in a tablet resolution
resources.itemsPerRowMobileHelpText: How many items, per row, will be shown in a mobile resolution
